00008 %{
00009 #include <stdio.h>
00010 #include "Oracle_classes.hpp"
00011 int yylex(void);
00012 int yyerror(O_oracle*,char*);
00013 %}
00014 
00015 %union
00016 {
00017     float   FNUM;
00018         int     NUM;
00019         char*   ALPHANUM;
00020 }
00021 
00022 %parse-param {O_oracle* NewOracle}
00023 
00024 %start  oracle
00025 
00026 %token <ALPHANUM> ORACLE_ID STRING
00027 %token  DIGRAPH LABEL TARGET
00028 %token  LINK EQ COMMA
00029 %token  NEW_LINE O_BRACKET C_BRACKET O_SBRACKET C_SBRACKET O_SQBRACKET C_SQBRACKET
00030 %token  <NUM> NUMBER
00031 %token  <FLOAT> FNUMBER
00032 
00033 
00034 %%
00035 
00036 oracle: DIGRAPH ORACLE_ID NEW_LINE
00037                 {
00038                         NewOracle->set_name($2);
00039                         //NewOracle->start();
00040                         //printf("Oracle's name: %s\n",$2);
00041             free($2);
00042                 } 
00043                 O_BRACKET NEW_LINE
00044                 stmt_list
00045                 node_list
00046                 C_BRACKET NEW_LINE
00047                 {
00048                         NewOracle->resolve_trans();
00049                 }
00050                 |
00051                 DIGRAPH STRING NEW_LINE
00052                 {
00053                         NewOracle->set_name($2);
00054                         //NewOracle->start();
00055                         //printf("Oracle's name: %s\n",$2);
00056             free($2);
00057                 } 
00058                 O_BRACKET NEW_LINE 
00059                 stmt_list
00060                 node_list
00061                 C_BRACKET NEW_LINE
00062                 {
00063                         NewOracle->resolve_trans();
00064                 }
00065         ;
00066 
00067 node_list:      /* empty */
00068                         |       node_list
00069                                 node
00070                         {};
00071 
00072 node:   O_BRACKET NEW_LINE
00073                 node_nb
00074                 trans_list
00075                 C_BRACKET NEW_LINE
00076                 {
00077                         O_state * LastState = (*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1];
00078                         pair<O_state*, int> LastSuffix = LastState->get_suffix();
00079                         pair<O_state*,int> NewRsuff (LastState, LastSuffix.second);
00080                         if (LastSuffix.first != NULL)
00081                         {
00082                                 //printf("Rsuffix: %d, lrs %d added to state %d\n", LastState->get_statenb(),LastSuffix.second,LastSuffix.first->get_statenb());
00083                                 LastSuffix.first->add_rsuff(NewRsuff);
00084                         }
00085                         //printf("End Node\n");
00086                 }
00087                 ;
00088                 
00089 node_nb:        NUMBER
00090                         {
00091                                 O_state * NewState = new O_state($1);
00092                                 NewOracle->push_state(NewState);
00093                                 //printf("Node %d\n",$1);
00094                         }
00095                         O_SQBRACKET target C_SQBRACKET NEW_LINE
00096 ;
00097 
00098 target:         TARGET EQ NUMBER
00099                         {
00100                                 ((*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1])->set_bufferef($3);
00101                                 //printf("target %d\n",$3);
00102                         }
00103 
00104 stmt_list:  /* empty */
00105             | attr_stmt NEW_LINE
00106               stmt_list
00107 
00108 attr_stmt:  STRING O_SQBRACKET attr_list C_SQBRACKET
00109             {
00110                 free($1);
00111             }
00112             | attr
00113                         
00114 attr_list:  /* empty */
00115             | attr COMMA attr_list
00116             | attr
00117             
00118 lrs:    LABEL EQ NUMBER
00119         {
00120                         ((*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1])->set_lrs($3);
00121                         //printf("lrs %d\n",$3);
00122                 }
00123             
00124 attr:   STRING EQ STRING
00125         {
00126             free($1);
00127             free($3);
00128         }
00129         | STRING EQ NUMBER
00130         {
00131             free($1);
00132         }
00133         | STRING EQ FNUMBER
00134         {
00135             free($1);
00136         }
00137 
00138 trans_list:     /* empty */
00139                         | trans_link NEW_LINE
00140                           trans_list
00141                         | suffix_link NEW_LINE
00142                         
00143 suffix_link:    NUMBER LINK NUMBER O_SQBRACKET lrs COMMA attr_list C_SQBRACKET
00144                                 {
00145                                         (*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1]->set_suffstate((*NewOracle)[$3]);
00146                                         //printf("suffix : %d\n",$3);
00147                                 }
00148                                 ;
00149                                 
00150 trans_link:             NUMBER LINK NUMBER O_SQBRACKET attr_list C_SQBRACKET
00151                 {
00152                                         (*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1]->add_trans((O_state*)$3);
00153                                         //printf("trans: %d\n",(O_state*)$3);
00154                                 }
00155                 | NUMBER LINK NUMBER
00156                                 {
00157                                         (*NewOracle)[NewOracle->get_size()-1]->add_trans((O_state*)$3);
00158                                         //printf("trans: %d\n",(O_state*)$3);
00159                                 }
00160                                 ;
00161                                 
00162 %%

00164 int yyerror(O_oracle*, char *s)
00165 {
00166   extern int yylineno;  /* defined and maintained in lex.c */
00167   extern char *yytext;  /* defined and maintained in lex.c */
00168   
00169   printf("ERROR: %s at symbol \"%s\"",s,yytext);
00170   printf("\" on line %d\n",yylineno);
00171   return 1;
00172 }
